channel.title: Ultraviolet versus Infrared
channel.description:
See this? No you bloody well didn't because Ultraviolet is the most kickass invisible wavelength band of light this side of xrays and short of microwaves! Know why Ultraviolet kicks ass? Because it's ultra freaking violet, it ain't no regular German po[b][/b]rnstar named violet it's Ultraviolet! You don't want to fu[b][/b]ck with Ultraviolet because Ultraviolet will fu[b][/b]ck with you right back and give you sunburn! Do you know why only 3% of the energy Earth receives by the Sun is Ultraviolet? Because God gave the Earth Ultraviolet, and saw that it was good, and Earth was like YO GOD YOU MORON ALL OUR ORGANISMS ARE FU[b][/b]CKING DYING DO SOMETHING, and God did nothing, so Earth was like love THIS SHIT and formed an Ozone layer to attempt to save the puny inhabitants of Earth from the all-mighty Ultraviolet, and Ultraviolet was all like, was all like, was all like NOTHING YOU IDIOTS Ultraviolet doesn't give a shit about you or the Ozone layer, Ultraviolet is like fu[b][/b]ck THIS SHIT and went on continuing being the biggest baddest wavelength longer than xrays but shorter than microwaves!
Know what else is fu[b][/b]cking awesome? SCORPIONS, know why scorpions are FU[b][/b]CKING AWESOME? Because scorpions were all like HEY ULTRAVIOLET IS KICKASS! LETS MAKE OUR EXOSKELETONS REFLECT ULTRAVIOLET LIGHT THAT WE CAN ALSO SEE BECAUSE ULTRAVIOLET IS GOD DAMN AWESOME, so scorpions made their exoskeletions reflect ultraviolet light and BECAME THE BIGGEST BADDEST ARACHNIDS OF THEM ALL.
ULTRAVIOLET!
